name: Rapturious-Vision
description:
Congratulations employee, and welcome aboard the Raptarious Space Station, except this isn't exactly the job you applied for. You awake one day to see that all the other crew have vanished from the station due to unknown circumstances and a malicious virus has overthrown the ships natural AI operating system! 

Hide, search and explore your way around to the escape shuttle and get back to earth. However, it won't be easy. Explore across a highly detailed environment, with a range of intractable elements, such as grabbing items, using keypads, light switches and logbooks.  

Feedback on the project is appreciated <3

Developed by a team of two over a 6 month period for a university project:  

Daniel Oldham (Programmer) Portfolio: https://www.dangodev.com/

Devon Gritton (Designer) Portfolio:  https://www.devongritton.com/
